dcterms:creator: Dan Barnes
Matthew Gadd
Paul Murcutt
Paul Newman
Ingmar Posner
dcterms:description: A dataset extending the Oxford RobotCar dataset with high-resolution radar data, providing synchronized Lidar and Radar streams for autonomous vehicle research. It includes 8,862 sample pairs of Lidar and Radar frames, split into training and testing sets for vehicle detection under various conditions.
dcterms:title: Oxford Radar Robotcar Dataset
